Package controller

Class FieldMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.FieldMenuController
  • public class FieldMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller of the action menu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.control.Button build
      Switches to a new scene where the current player can build houses and hotels
      private javafx.scene.control.Button buy
      Buys the current property
      private javafx.scene.control.Button deal
      Makes the current player deal with any other player
      private javafx.scene.control.Button dontBuy
      Does not buy the current property
      private javafx.scene.control.Button endOfRound
      Ends the round
      private FieldController fieldController
      The parent controller of this controller
      private javafx.scene.control.Button loan
      Gets a loan from the bank.
      private javafx.scene.control.Button mortgage
      Allows the player to mortgage one of their properties
      private javafx.scene.control.Button pay
      Pays an amount of money to the bank or to another player.
      private javafx.scene.control.Button payTheFine
      Pays the bank an amount of money to get out of jail.
      private javafx.scene.control.Button properties
      Displays the properties of each player
      private javafx.scene.control.Button rollTheDice
      Rolls the dices
      private javafx.scene.control.Button skills
      Displays the skills scene
